segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene, quite detailed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a line drawing, showing three figures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink on the right wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running freely from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is completely full and water is spilling over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a continuous sheet, cascading onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is forming on the floor, getting larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see an adult woman standing right in front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, without a hint of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in that expanding puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the sheer volume of water everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and hurt herself, or drop that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious she remains to the chaos unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm and the overflowing sink is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
